keySwitches.Name: MX Black
keySwitches.Description:
Powerful and Direct. 
A linear switch with increased actuation pressure

keySwitches.Name: MX Red
keySwitches.Description:
Smooth and Direct. 
A linear switch with low actuation pressure. A good first choice for beginners

keySwitches.Name: MX Clear
keySwitches.Description:
Focused, Powerful, and Noticeable. 
A Tactile switch with no click, and a sister model to the MX Brown and MX Grey

keySwitches.Name: MX Gray
keySwitches.Description:
Focused, Robust, and Noticeable. 
A slightly modified version of the MX Brown. Offers increased actuation pressure

keySwitches.Name: MX Green
keySwitches.Description:
Clicky, Robust, and Noticeable. 
A slightly modified version of the MX Blue. Offers increased actuation pressure

keySwitches.Name: MX Speed Silver
keySwitches.Description:
Fast and Direct. 
The fastest model of CHERRY MX in full height. Linear with low actuation pressure

keySwitches.Name: MX Silent Red
keySwitches.Description:
Smooth and Silent. 
A modified version of the MX red that uses damping to reliably minimize noise.

keySwitches.Name: MX Blue
keySwitches.Description:
Clicky and Noticeable. 
A Tactile switch that provides audible acoustic feedback

keySwitches.Name: MX Brown
keySwitches.Description:
Focused and Noticeable. 
A Tactile switch with noticeable feedback
